Package org.openadaptor.core.exception

Exception classes used and recognised by the openadaptor processing framework

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IExceptionHandler Interface for OA exception handler that allows for setting a custom exception map.
 

Class Summary
ExceptionHandlerProxy A class that can be used for either of: redefining the exceptionMap to route different exception types to different handlers.
MessageException Used in Response, RuntimeExceptions thrown from calls to IDataProcessor.process(Object) are wrapped in this class with the argument to the call.
 

Exception Summary
ComponentException Deprecated. Please use the appropriate OAException subclass instead.
ConnectionException OAException for external resource problems.
NullRecordException Exception class for Exceptions relating to null records.
OAException Base class extended by all openadaptor unchecked exceptions.
ProcessingException OAException relating to processing problems.
RecordConversionException Exception class for exceptions related to converting records.
RecordException Exception class for exceptions related to processing Records
RecordFormatException Exception to indicate that there is a problem with the format of a Record.
ValidationException OAException that relates to incomplete or incorrect configured state.
 

Package org.openadaptor.core.exception Description

Exception classes used and recognised by the openadaptor processing framework
